mapper.select: select u.t_user_id, u.t_user_name, u.t_user_status, u.t_user_email from codeworld_user u where t_user_name = #{userName}

select cu.t_user_id AS userId, cu.t_user_name As userName, cu.t_user_email AS userEmail, cu.t_user_phone AS userPhone, cu.t_user_status AS userStatus, cu.t_area_name AS areaName, cu.t_create_time AS createTime, cu.t_update_time AS updateTime, cd.t_dept_name AS deptName from codeworld_user_dept cud left join codeworld_user cu on cud.t_user_id = cu.t_user_id left join codeworld_dept cd on cud.t_dept_id = cd.t_dept_id where cud.t_dept_id = #{deptId} order by cu.t_create_time DESC

select cu.t_user_id AS userId, cu.t_user_name AS userName fro codeworld_user_role AS cur left join codeworld_user AS cu on cur.t_user_id = cu.t_user_id left join codeworld_role AS cr on cur.t_role_id = cr.t_role_id where cur.t_role_id = 31845 and cu.t_user_name like "%"#{userName}"%"
select t_user_id AS userId, t_user_avatar AS avatar, t_user_status AS userStatus from codeworld_user where t_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT cu.t_user_id AS userId, cu.t_user_name AS userName FROM codeworld_user AS cu LEFT JOIN codeworld_user_role AS cur ON cu.t_user_id = cur.t_user_id WHERE cu.t_area_name = ( SELECT t_area_name FROM codeworld_user AS cu2 WHERE cu2.t_user_id = #{userId} ) AND cur.t_role_id = ( SELECT t_role_id FROM codeworld_user_role AS cur2 WHERE cur2.t_user_id = #{userId} ) and cu.t_user_id != #{userId} and cu.t_user_name like "%"#{userName}"%"
mapper.update: update codeworld_user set t_user_name = #{userName}, t_user_email = #{userEmail}, t_user_phone = #{userPhone}, t_user_status = #{userStatus}, t_area_id = #{areaId}, t_area_name = #{areaName}, t_update_time = #{updateTime} where t_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_user (t_user_id, t_user_name, t_user_email, t_user_phone, t_user_status, t_area_name, t_area_id, t_create_time, t_update_time) values ( #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userStatus}, #{areaName}, #{areaId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} );
